main event: A white light was observed moving east and straight upwards near New York City on May 22, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted between 5 to 10 minutes,The object was observed for three minutes during its movement,It was described as a bright flashing white light,The object was located approximately 5 to 6 miles due north of a post,The conclusion speculated that the sighting might have been caused by an aircraft.
